DataElement.preferredName: Injection Site Pain Occurrence Severity Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response regarding the degree of pain that occurs at the injection site of medication or a vaccine.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected.:The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.

Concepts.definition: The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Injection Site Pain Tenderness Severity Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected._The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings._Discomfort elicited through touch or pressure._Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: The anatomic site at which a medication or a vaccine is injected.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
Discomfort elicited through touch or pressure.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
